title: Larry Kosilla
description:
Matt sits down with childhood friend and internationally known detailer, Larry Kosilla. Topics include: Matt picks up his new Porsche Boxster Spyder; paint correcting a new car; his AWD 964's unique driving dynamics; life with his Taycan and range anxiety; choosing lighting for your garage; why one test-drives a car after detailing; whether modern seats need leather conditioning, and more!

Recorded at AMMO Studio/Detailing Center on October 22, 2022

 

FIND BERRYMAN AT ALL MAJOR AUTOMOTIVE RETAILERS. FOR MORE INFORMATION, GO TO BERRYMANPRODUCTS.COM

 

Right now, you can get Harry’s Starter Set for just $3. Plus, you’ll get a free travel-size body wash. The set includes a 5-blade razor, weighted handle, foaming shave gel, and a travel cover. A $16 value for just $3. Just visit harrys.com/TIRE
